categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel

nodes.text: Kem Tija was a high-ranking official in COMPNOR. Tija was Executive Director for the Art Group within the Sector Monitor of the Coalition for Progress for the Sanbra sector.

One of Tija's subordinates, Bront Autin, sent the director a message about the Iyra sentientologist Tem Eliss and the impending publication of his book The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life. Autin recommended to Tija that Eliss be detained for questioning, and that the distribution of his manuscript be restricted. Eliss fled the University of Sanbra campus before being arrested, however.
